name: Spicy Oven-Fried Potato Wedges
author: S.P.

ingredients.name: baking potatoes, cut into thin wedges

instructions: Preheat oven to 450Â°. Spray nonstick baking sheet with Pam. Pour oil over potatoes and arrange on baking sheet. Bake 10 minutes. Turn potatoes and bake 10 minutes longer, until lightly browned. Sprinkle with spices and mix well.
